title: [Abbey Stables]
description: Motes of dust float gently in shafts of light streaming into the stable through great holes torn from the thatched ceiling.  The hard-packed floor is littered with molding straw, from which puffs of dust arise with one's every movement.

Motes of dust float gently in shafts of moonlight streaming into the stable through great holes torn from the thatched ceiling.  The hard-packed floor is littered with molding straw, from which puffs of dust arise with one's every movement.
